record.title: ORDER FOR REPORTING AND RECORD TO REMAIN OPEN

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that on Friday, May 4, 2007, notwithstanding a recess or adjournment of the Senate, Senate committees may report Legislative and Executive Calendar business and that the RECORD remain open for the submission of statements and the introduction of legislation until 1 p.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
